synopsis.text: Life as a villainess takes a twist in "My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! X" as the protagonist receives guidance from an unlikely source: the 'Katarina Five'. These short specials, posted on the official Twitter account, reveal a unique plot where the protagonist's decisions are influenced by a council of five Katarinas residing within her mind. Their mission? To prevent the disastrous endings of an "Otome Game" by orchestrating the protagonist's next moves. Delve into this intriguing world where the stakes are high, and the fate of a villainess hangs in the balance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
